title: WETANU IHE ONYINYE DI MMA (LET US BRING OUR GOOD GIFTS)
author: Luke Ekene
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (contemporary Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Wetanu ihe onyinye di mma k'anyi nyenu Chukwu kere anyi

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Onye n'enye Chukwu onyinye dim ma na-akwadoro onwe ya aku na uba n'igwe

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Bianu nye ya onyinye dinn ma bianu nye ya onyinye dim ma
K'anyi nye ya onyinye dim ma nye ya n'ihe omere anyi en ka.

sections.title: Chorus
content: Bia kelee ya (kelee Nna O meeka) O meeka kelee Chineke O meeka
Kelee Onye kere wa O meeka kelee ya n'Ohuru gi n'anya

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Gawanun'altar nke Chukwu klanyi nyenu ya ihe di mma
Chukwu Onye kel'uwa n'ihe di ya k'anyi nyenu ya ihe di mma

sections.title: Verse 5
content: Onyinye nile si n'aka Chukwu k'anyi nyenu ya ihe di mma
Chukwu nyere anyi ndu n'ahuike k'anyi nyenu ya ihe di mma

sections.title: Verse 6
content: Chukwu nyer'anyi aku n'uba nile k'anyi nyenu mma
Chukwu nyer'anyi kuku na mmiri k'anyi nye: mma

sections.title: Verse 7
content: Onwa na anyanwu b'onyinye Chukwu k'anyi nye ihe di mma
Oburu n'inweghi ih'ig enye Chukwu, were onwe nye ya
